**Government Tender Announcement for Motor Coaches with Operators**
==========================================================

**Title:** W3666-24N008 Motor Coaches with Operators RISO
**Reference Number:** WS4442719900-Doc4546865407
**Solicitation Number:** WS4442719900

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-03
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-22T14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 6
**Amendment Date:** 2024-07-15

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

**Notice Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) and 41 Canadian Brigade Group (41 CBG) are seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of labour, transportation, materials, tools, equipment, and supervision necessary to provide passenger motor coaches (40 passengers and above) with operators. The contract period will span from October 1, 2024, to September 30, 2025, with two one-year option periods.

**Basis of Payment:**
Payment will be made in accordance with the payment terms outlined in the Annex Basis of Payment.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**
Suppliers must meet all requirements specified in the Annex Mandatory Technical Criteria in order to be considered for the contract.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation falls under the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
